text:
Hey everyone,
my team develop a serverless function (for a CRM Card) for a client. He wants us to acces to one of these API but for security reason, he want you to tell him the IP Adresse where the call will from, to authorize it.
Do you now if it's possible to know this information ?

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/guides/apps/authentication/validating-requests|You can use request signature verification to verify that the request is coming from HubSpot though>!!!! (These docs apply to requests from serverless functions too I believe)
Okay, thank for your anwser. I will explain this to my client
